title: Alien Hominid Invasion Free Download
description:
Abduct intel from your enemies to sabotage their plans, observe the oddities of human life, blow up bosses, and mutate into a variety of powerful alien forms in order to take down the not-so-secret agents that are dead set on ruining your day.
Invade with up to four players through online co-op, couch co-op, or both Play across skill gaps with difficulty being set per player – one player can choose Friendly while another loses their mind on Insane Mastery Mode – earn more experience and better drops, but lose it all on death YOLO!! Permakeep – the standard alien invasion experience There’s nothing wrong with wanting to keep your stuff

system_requirements.Processor: Intel Core i3 or AMD FX
